select A.OFFER_INST_ID offerInstId, A.OFFER_ID offerId, A.EFF_DATE effDate, A.EXP_DATE expDate, A.STATUS_CD statusCd, A.OPER_TYPE operType, A.CREATE_DATE createDate, A.ARCH_GRP_ID, A.ORDER_ITEM_ID from ORD_OFFER_INST A, crm_rent B where 1=1
and SUBSTR(REGION_ID, 1, 5) = #{regionId}
AND A.STATUS_CD IN ('1000', '1100', '2') AND A.CREATE_DATE > DATE_SUB(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL 30 day) AND A.ARCH_GRP_ID = B.ARCH_GRP_ID AND A.OFFER_INST_ID = B.OFFER_INST_ID AND A.ORDER_ITEM_ID = B.ORDER_ITEM_ID
ORDER BY A.ARCH_GRP_ID
